content: List down 25 words that begin with 're'.

Sure, here are 25 words that begin with "re":

1. Return
2. Repeat
3. Replace
4. Report
5. Request
6. Require
7. Resemble
8. Reserve
9. Respect
10. Respond
11. Restore
12. Review
13. Reward
14. Ride
15. Right
16. Ring
17. Rip
18. Rise
19. Risk
20. Rival
21. Roam
22. Roast
23. Rob
24. Rock
25. Rod

I hope this helps! If you need more words or have any other questions, feel free to ask.
